content.rendered:
Directed by Tarun Mansukhani

Written by Mast Ali

Cast Sushant Singh Rajput (Samar). Jacqueline Fernandez (Tara / Alisha Malik / Mrs. Khan). Vikramjeet Virk (Bikki). Sapna Pabbi (Naina). Boman Irani (Irfan). Pankaj Tripathi (Hamid). Vibha Chhibber (Vibha Singh). Kaustubh Kumar (Raj). Paniza Rahnama ((as Paniz Rehnama)).Shweta Nair. Anuj Jain (Feroz).Arun Khaini. Gaurav Chaudhari (Arjun). Ramesh Khanna (Mr. Mehta). Dimple Verma (Mr. Singhania). Ramakant Dayma (Mr. Kumar (as Ramakant Dayaama)). Zachary Coffin (Bank Manager). Anil Khopkar (Col. Khurana). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal (Rathore). Kancha Karki (Bishnu). Chaitanya Bhatt (Admin Staff). Neeta Sadhu (Female Security). Mayank Mishra (Security Guard). Samraut Soni (Service Entrance Guard). Mrigendra Konwar (Guard 1). Sagar Chabukswar (Guard 2). Yohan Contractor (Car Camera Crew). Utkarsh Marulkar (Car Camera Crew). Abhay Raha (Car Camera Crew). Jagjeet Batth (Sardar Racer). Guru Saran Tiwari (Sardar Racer (as Saran Tiwari)). Danesh Irani (Angry Driver). Parichit Paralkar (Pilot). Manik Dawar (Co-Pilot). Dev (Goon at Jewelry Store) . Braj Kishore Tiwari (CBI Officer). Torrell Vinson (Dancer (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Danesh Irani. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Pravin Khairnar. Apoorva Mehta. Ravi Sarin. Shantanu Tungare

Production Dharma Production. Fox STAR Studio
